error.message: Call to deprecated function db_update(). Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Instead, get a database connection injected into your service from the container and call update() on it. For example,

Call to deprecated constant DRUPAL_ANONYMOUS_RID: Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use Drupal\Core\Session\AccountInterface::ANONYMOUS_ROLE or \Drupal\user\RoleInterface::ANONYMOUS_ID instead.

Call to deprecated constant DRUPAL_AUTHENTICATED_RID: Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use Drupal\Core\Session\AccountInterface::AUTHENTICATED_ROLE or \Drupal\user\RoleInterface::AUTHENTICATED_ID instead.
Call to deprecated function entity_get_display(). Deprecated in drupal:8.8.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use EntityDisplayRepositoryInterface::getViewDisplay() instead.
Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.
Call to deprecated method l() of class Drupal\Core\Controller\ControllerBase. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Link::fromTextAndUrl() instead.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to kalastatic.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
